document_data.name: Mellast Ormblade
document_data.mainbody: '''Mellast Ormblade''' was a noble in [[Cormyr]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Mellast Ormblade was the worst sort of snob, but he was genuinely cultivated.{{cite book/Elminster Must Die/MMP|240|23}}
document_data.Abilities: He had a gift with words, and with diplomacy.
document_data.Relationships: Per [[Arclath Delcastle]], Mellast Ormblade ran with a circle that included the lords [[Broryn Windstag]], [[Delasko Sornstern]], [[Kathkote Dawntard]], [[Irlin Stonestable]], [[Sacrast Handragon]], and [[Marlin Stormserpent]]. He was one of the more formidable lords there.{{cite book/Elminster Must Die/MMP|364|34}}
document_data.History:
Mellast Ormblade was one of the guests at the [[Open Feast]] in [[Mirtul 26]] of the {{yearlinkName|1479}}, where he briefly inquired with Marlin Stormserpent about a project of the latter's.{{cite book/Elminster Must Die/MMP|69|6}} He also was with Broryn Windstag's posse when they got kicked out of the [[Dragonriders Club]], and went to [[Stormserpent Towers]] afterwards, a few days after.

In the calamitous aftermath of the [[Council of the Dragon]] days after, he met with Broryn Windstag and Sacrast Handragon, who were at [[Staghaven House]]; he brought with himself news of the deaths at Council.{{cite book/Bury Elminster Deep|124-125|13}} While he was there, the moot was joined by [[Traevyn Illance]], Marlin Stormserpent, and briefly visited by [[Osbur]].{{cite book/Bury Elminster Deep|134-135|14}}
